website_summaries.verdict: Designed by orthopedists and surgeons, this premium bunion splint provides effective support without compromising comfort.
pros: Built-in metal plate for supportive correction and toe alignment
cons: Hook-and-loop straps need occasional readjustment to maintain secure fit

customer_reviews.title: not ideal
customer_reviews.text: They were not easy to use or figure out. Not the same size for both feet. I needed one for each foot. I thought there would be a little pressure at first but it was like wearing a band-aid.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine B. Passey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend to anyone currently suffering from bunion pain. They are comfortable and easy to use. Product was perfect and received mine the next day!
customer_reviews.author: selina

customer_reviews.title: Bunion Support
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I purchased this kit it includes the bunion brace and soft gel toe separators. The night brace is easy to use and provides firm support. Love the gel separators after a long day in shoes with bunion pain. Overall great value kit!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I ordered mine some weeks back and so far it has been really helpful. Anybody suffering from bunion pain should get this!!!! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived pretty fast. This is what I needed for my Bunion pain, after being on my feet all day. It's very comfortable and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tarleton

customer_reviews.title: Some discomfort
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to use, but the first few times of using is a little uncomfortable. This does soon become better.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Wade Sr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They definitely make my feet sore but that is probably because they are straightening my toe.
customer_reviews.author: montana girl

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it after work during evenings. It reduces pain and eases pressure. Toe separators are a great bonus. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosio Orocio

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for as far as adjustable support, the toe separators as well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Duran

customer_reviews.title: They are helping
customer_reviews.text: Great price!! I just wear them a little bit each day and they are helping!
customer_reviews.author: LAG

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would recommend to anyone. I'm ordering more for as gifts for my parents and uncles!
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio

product_meta.title: Aid-Mate Bunion Corrector and Bunion Relief Kit Bunion Splint Toe Separators Hammer Toe Straightener Toe Spacers Orthopedic Bunion Corrector for Men and Women
product_meta.description:
AID-MATE BUNION CORRECTOR KIT

2 Bunion Splints and 2 Toe Separators Included

Are you tired of suffering from bunion pain? Enough suffering and discomfort. Use our bunion care set to relieve pain and correct toes!

Our bunion care set is exclusively developed for effective correction and pain relief from bunion, hallux valgus, hammertoe and overlapping toes. The kit will gently help restore natural positioning of your toes while reducing pressure and discomfort for pain relief.

Advantages of our bunion corrector kit:

– Relieves pain in the feet

– Provides natural foot alignment

– Effective bunion correction and toe separation

– Comfortable and easy to use

– Quality materials washable and durable

Bunion Splint – Protects and supports the big toe with an integrated aluminum brace. Gently realigns the toe to slow the formation and progression of bunions, while providing pain-relieving support.

Use daily while sleeping or resting.

Toe Separators – Stretches, separates and lengthens the toes, reducing strain on the joints, muscles and other tissues throughout foot. Toe separators simply slip on and provide relief by improving alignment of each toe and separating overlapping toes.

Begin wearing for 15 minutes per session and increase up to an hour.



AS WITH ANY CONDITIONING PROGRAM, THE BUNION SPLINT AND TOE SEPARATORS MIGHT BE UNCOMFORTABLE AT FIRST. THIS OFTEN MEANS THAT YOUR FEET REALLY NEED THEM!



ADD TO CART NOW and get rid of bunion pain with this non-invasive, non-surgical bunion treatment. Enjoy doing the activities you love again!
feature_bullets: ✔ RELIEVE BUNION PAIN – Our bunion corrector kit is specifically designed to give instant relief to pain caused by bunions and slowly and gently realign your toes into their original and natural position.

✔ RESTORE NATURAL ALIGNMENT – Bunion splint uses an integrated aluminum plate to apply strong yet gentle pressure on the big toe to realign it. Gel toe separators will help separate, straighten and realign your toes.

✔ FLEXIBLE SIZING FITS MOST – Bunion splints are fully adjustable to your feet size and shape in order to provide a nonslip fit. Toe separators are easy to slip on your toes and provide relief by improving arrangement of each toe.

✔ PREMIUM QUALITY MATERIAL – Bunion splints made from lightweight and breathable terry cloth material for a comfortable fit. Toe separators made of premium medical-grade gel, which is stretchable and irritation-free.

✔ AID-MATE GUARANTEE – We ensure that our products are top quality and produce effective results. Add your bunion corrector kit to cart knowing that if you are not completely satisfied we will provide you with a full refund.
